# OWASP ZAP Security Scan Rules Configuration
# Custom rules for Sinthome website security scanning

# Ignore rules (format: IGNORE	[RULE_ID]	[URL_REGEX]	[PARAMETER]	[CWE_ID]	[WASC_ID])

# Ignore Google Forms external links (expected behavior)
IGNORE	10202	.*docs\.google\.com.*			

# Ignore Google Analytics/Fonts external resources
IGNORE	10202	.*googleapis\.com.*			
IGNORE	10202	.*gstatic\.com.*			

# Ignore CSP inline styles (required for some Astro components)
IGNORE	10055	.*	style		

# Allow specific inline scripts for theme switching
IGNORE	10055	.*	applyTheme		

# Specific security thresholds
# THRESHOLD	[RULE_ID]	[THRESHOLD]

# Set stricter thresholds for production
THRESHOLD	10202	5	# External redirects
THRESHOLD	10055	3	# CSP violations
THRESHOLD	10038	0	# Content type not specified
THRESHOLD	10021	0	# X-Content-Type-Options missing

# Custom scanning parameters
# INCLUDE	[URL_REGEX]
INCLUDE	.*sinthome.*
INCLUDE	.*localhost:4321.*

# EXCLUDE	[URL_REGEX] 
EXCLUDE	.*\/api\/.*	# Exclude API endpoints if any
EXCLUDE	.*\.map$	# Exclude source maps
EXCLUDE	.*node_modules.*	# Exclude dependencies"
